DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , single-arm , Phase 2 trial ass efficacy safety single-agent eribulin mesylate first-line treatment subject locally recurrent metastatic human epidermal growth factor receptor ( HER2 ) -negative breast cancer . A total 52 adult female subject enrol treated eribulin mesylate ( 1.4 mg/m2 intravenous [ i.v . ] infusion 2 5 minute Days 1 8 3-week cycle ) .
